corpus.description: Wall Street Journal Texts from the PropBank Project
corpus.name: PropBank

lexUnit.definition: FN: come out (from a hidden position).

sentence.text: Michael Newman argues that the Labour party adopted the view that fascism only emerged where parliamentary democracy was not well established .

Far to the East , a young man emerges dripping from the river Neisse on the border between East Germany and Poland .

We left the trees behind and emerged into the open .
